dialogue.speaker: Speaker 1
text: The migration has taken you through many crossroads, but the herd is often alone in their travels.
Today, you spy a lone figure in the distance as you make your way across the terrain.
As you get closer, you see that the figure is another llama, limping weakly towards your herd.

options.text: Offer help to the llama as you pass
Continue past without acknowledging the llama

dialogue.speaker: Speaker 1
text: The llama explains that they’ve been separated from their herd and has been on the road for nearly two weeks without any contact.
You offer to take them with you, and the weary traveller gratefully accepts.
Feeding their empty belly costs you some precious food, but sharing the road with companions is even more precious.
